Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the ephemeral value of a RequestBatchItem.
        """
kwargs = {'ephemeral': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The ephemeral value must be a boolean.',
    messages.RequestBatchItem, **kwargs)
args = messages.RequestBatchItem(), 'ephemeral', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The ephemeral value must be a boolean.',
    setattr, *args)
